data.title: #1 Rated Nightly Ghost Tours
data.meta_description: Are you ready to experience the ghosts of Cincinnati? Cincinnati hides a history of shocking hauntings behind its Midwest charms. Join us to uncover the...
data.text:
Cincinnati Ghosts is for skeptics and dedicated believers alike! While we can’t guarantee you’ll witness an apparition, what we can guarantee is that you’ll get plenty of thrills and chills on your tour. Many of the stops on your tour are spooky in broad daylight, but when the tour starts, just as night falls, the shadows darken, and they become even more disturbing.

Add in your expert local guide’s narration of the deaths, sickness, and violent acts that happened here in Queen City, and you’ve got a mix guaranteed to scare even the most seasoned ghost hunters. The stories of hauntings we tell at each stop on your tour are based on eyewitness accounts and long-lived local legends, and many of the sites boast decades of reported ghost activity. We encourage you to take photos throughout your tour and to report any anomalies you witness!

You’ve seen the Cincinnati Aquarium up close, watched all the Reds games you can handle for the season, and seen every single amazing neon sign in the American Sign Museum. Just when you think you’ve seen all the historic sites Cincinnati has to offer, think again! Cincinnati Ghosts is a perfect change of pace from the more conventional attractions. You’ll leave your tour with some fascinating stories about Cincinnati and its ghosts. Whether this is for entertaining out-of-town guests if you are a native of Cincinnati or telling friends and family about your visit to the Queen City, you are going to be more entertaining after a tour with Cincinnati Ghosts.

Maybe you want a fun warm-up to an evening of hopping around Over-The-Rhine’s many restaurants and bars, or perhaps you’re looking to impress a date with something unusual. Tours with Cincinnati Ghosts are scheduled to fit everyone’s schedule, even on weekdays. Your spooky experience will last around an hour and a half—the perfect time to get to know a date, have fascinating things to discuss on a night on the town or wind down from a fun day of sight-seeing.

See our Tour Details page for more information about the times and location of our tours.

Haunted Cincinnati offers customizable group tours if you are looking for the perfect activity for your next group event! Our team of informative guides can help you plan the perfect group tour. We can even work with you to tailor your tour according to your specific interests and needs. Just let us know what you’re looking for, and we’ll work with you to help make it happen! Check out our Group Tours page for more information and to make a booking.

Have you tried other guided tours of Cincinnati before and found yourself trudging behind an unenthusiastic guide who mumbled a few facts and dates before herding their flock to the next boring stop?

Fear not! Cincinnati Ghosts is anything but a conventional tour. Our guides are fun, knowledgeable, enthusiastic, and committed to making sure you have the best tour possible. We want you to ask questions, get involved, and enjoy your tour! And, unlike a conventional tour, our tours are designed with entertainment in mind.

You won’t find any costumes, pranks, or surprises. The stories you will hear on your tour are entertaining enough, even though they are based on research and historical facts. As they say, truth is stranger than fiction, and we have some pretty strange tales to share. We have carefully crafted the route to be entertaining and ripe with factual data and present evidence of the ghostly and incomprehensible, bringing you the best of the stories and the most amazing facts from the storied history of Cincinnati.

What better way to build team spirit than to take your employees out for a group ghost tour? Cincinnati Ghosts has a little of something for everyone—scary stories for the thrill-seekers, research-based history for the scholars, and fun for everyone! Check out our Group Tours page for information on how to start putting together the best company outing your employees have ever attended!

Over-The-Rhine has a vibrant brewing scene, with a new craft beer place opening every week it seems. Maybe you’ve had enough brews from Taft’s for a lifetime! In that case, join Cincinnati Ghosts to hear the haunted history of Taft’s. If you want to take a break from trying every single new microbrew the neighborhood has to offer, then try Cincinnati Ghosts instead!

Do we have you convinced yet? Book your tour today!
